meanings.definition: In a pleasing or appealing manner.
meanings.sent1: She smiled attractively at the puppy.
meanings.sent2: The flowers were arranged attractively in the vase.
meanings.sent3: The cat purred attractively while chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset blended attractively in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The new car sparkled attractively under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: In a way that draws attention or interest.
meanings.sent1: The shiny object glinted attractively in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The mysterious book title was attractively written on the cover.
meanings.sent3: The magician attractively pulled a rabbit out of his hat.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice carried attractively across the room.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked cookies wafted attractively through the house.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is visually appealing.
meanings.sent1: The model posed attractively for the camera.
meanings.sent2: The painting was attractively framed on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream cone attractively dripped down his hand.
meanings.sent4: The city lights shone attractively in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The dress flowed attractively as she walked down the runway.
